Date: Thursday, 5/1/1984
Subject: Status of Mike Bohn
Dear Sir,
Mike Bohn shouldn't play at AA Margate Bridges!
He has an AVG of .227 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1984
Subject: Progress of Lynwood Lingerfelt
Dear Sir,
Lynwood Lingerfelt has an ERA of 2.43 at AA Margate Bridges!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1984
Subject: Progress of Eric Northrop
Dear Sir,
Eric Northrop has nothing more to prove at A Somer's Point Tug Boats!
He has an AVG of .402 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Jason Cotton

Steven Hood
